sections.title: Summary
sections.description: Software Engineer with multiple years of software development experience. A full-time learner with an affinity for Linux, Vim, and the command line. Curious tinkerer who will fiddle with any software or hardware I can get my hands (or keyboard) on. A natural-born problem-solver passionate about mathematics, cryptography, and open source software.

items.title: Software Engineering Intern
descriptions: Built application to compare, diff, and validate options in locomotive configuration files.
Built application to perform mechanical analysis on wireframe structures and identify failure conditions.
Created VBA script to pass CSV data to mechanical analysis application and generate insights.
Extended configuration editor software to support an arbitrary number of files and modify user-selected fields.

items.title: Software Engineering Intern
descriptions: Identified causes of locomotive failure by parsing log data.
Parsed fault logs to identify causes of locomotive failure.
Wrote DXL script to batch update locomotive configuration and diagnostic data.
Implemented single-sign-on functionality to numerous internal tools using OAuth authentication.

items.title: Government Services Intern
descriptions: Ensured worker safety on construction and maintenance projects by establishing proper setup and teardown procedures.

items.title: Captain: THINK Developer
descriptions: Created REST API for THINK server to communicate with external applications.
Dockerized development environment to reduce the onboarding time for new developers.
Rewrote navigation UI to make THINK interface responsive and mobile-friendly.

items.title: Programmer
descriptions: Interfaced directly with hardware components using C to create autonomously controlled robot.
